channel.title: Missing Backgrounds
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Missing Backgrounds" - I'm gonna add the last backgrounds we don't already have (State of Hillsfar and Acquisitions Inc)

item.title: Re: Missing Backgrounds
item.content:encoded: all finished, ready to be put on the homepage whenever there's time! not sure if Acquisitions Inc should get its own specific setting for its backgrounds, but they're not quite general enough to fit with any campaign. then again, Sword Coast Adventurer's Guide and Wild Beyond the Witchlight backgrounds are under common backgrounds, so it could go either way.

item.title: Missing Backgrounds
item.content:encoded:
It took me a while since I couldn't find the State of Hillsfar backgrounds pdf, but now that I have, I'll be working on the last backgrounds we haven't made pages for yet. I'll update this forum as I do it. Let me know if there's any we still don't have and I'll add them to the list.

Source Background Status
State of Hillsfar Secret Identity Page Complete
State of Hillsfar Shade Fanatic Page Complete
State of Hillsfar Trade Sheriff Page Complete
Acquisitions Inc Celebrity Adventurer's Scion Page Complete
Acquisitions Inc Failed Merchant Page Complete
Acquisitions Inc Gambler Page Complete
Acquisitions Inc Plaintiff Page Complete
Acquisitions Inc Rival Intern Page Complete
